arts.ttl: Stuttgart snatch dramatic late point against resilient Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Valentin Gendrey slots home past Alexander Nübel to give Hoffenheim a surprise lead just before half-time. Ermedin Demirović's last-gasp goal rescued a point for Stuttgart in a dramatic 1-1 draw with Hoffenheim just when Valentin Gendrey's earlier effort looked to have won the day for the visitors.

arts.ttl: Demirović strikes late as Stuttgart draw with Hoffenheim in dramatic finale
arts.sum: Stuttgart faced Hoffenheim in the final fixture of Bundesliga Matchday 6 and it was not short in drama as Ermedin Demirović bagged an injury-time goal to level matters at 1-1.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart vs. Hoffenheim preview: Die Schwaben looking to extend unbeaten run
arts.sum: Stuttgart will look to extend their unbeaten run to five league matches when they welcome Hoffenheim to the MHP Arena on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Preview: Stuttgart vs. Hoffenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Stuttgart and Hoffenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
